tool_description: StopwordAPI.com offers an easy solution for you to retrieve words that you want to remove from a string. This filtering process is common in NLP (Natural Language Processing) algorithms and is useful whenever you want to eliminate unnecessary words from user input in your software application. StopwordAPI.com categorizes the words, making it easy for you to download only the words you need, even if you do not know the language.

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Will list all available word categories. Check this before calling /stopwords.

api_list.name: Stopwords
api_list.description: Will return the exact extract words to use in your data analysis or application.

optional_parameters.name: langs
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of language isocodes.

optional_parameters.name: details
optional_parameters.description: Boolean (1 or 0) indicating whether you want details about each word.

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of categories. Use /categories to get IDs.

api_list.name: Detect the language from a string
api_list.description: Post your text to our API and we will return the language with the original language with the highest probability.
